General.Name: Roundtop Machinery Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: Roundtop Machinery Industries Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells machine tools in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. The company provides vertical machining, high speed horizontal/vertical and horizontal machining, horizontal boring and milling, double column multi-axis/5-face machining, double column fixed/moving multi-axis/5-face machining, turning, floor type boring machining, and gantry type machining centers. It also offers slant-bed CNC super lathes; flat-bed CNC lathes and CNC screw cutting machines; and order-made machines, as well as technical support and after sales services. Roundtop Machinery Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
